channel.title: HELP ME PLEASE this isnt fair!i have obeyed rules...no 1 helps me!
channel.description:
well on my runserver....it will letme log on for 3 seconds...but screen stays black...then logs me off...and wont letme log back on...
heres the error?
Starting JulyServer on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:312) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:28) ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:50682 Client type: high memory version UserId: 91436217 Muscles is signing onto server. Muscles: character file not found. LOADED: 3 ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:50683 Client type: high memory version UserId: 91436217 Muscles is signing onto server. [client-2-Muscles]: Muscles is already online. ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:50684 Client type: high memory version UserId: 91436217 Muscles is signing onto server. [client-3-Muscles]: Muscles is already online.
help plz? and i have jdk 6u2 and it wont letme compile...i have mod tharoks compiler. it says this....
You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0 or any JDK 5.0 and 6.0 updates. Go to Mod Taharok's tutorial on the Moparscape Tuturoials section for step-by-step instructions to download the newest JDK Update. Press any key to continue . . .
